name: Moonbeam (itch)
description:
It's another blissful summer evening. Enjoy a quiet walk down to the beach with the company of your neighbours, the dune plants and the endless lull of the ocean.

This game is a little nostalgia piece inspired by my home town. I hope you enjoy it ^_^

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~

  • WASD/Arrow Keys/left joystick to move
  • Mouse/right joystick to move camera
  • ESC to exit game

Music: Good (Bad?) Old Days by Masayoshi Takanaka (from An Insatiable High, 1977)

Beach audio by "Jillismolenaar" (from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Jillismolenaar/sounds/251981/)

(I highly recommend playing on the highest graphics setting as there's a few little glitches in the lower settings which I'm not sure how to fix at this time!)

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~

Thank you so much for checking out my game. If you like it, I'd love to hear from you here or on Twitter: @pixsule

Happy holidays <3
